channel.title: MSSQL on #Sharp Monkey
channel.description: Recent content in MSSQL on #Sharp Monkey

item.title: VS Code + Microsoft SQL Server on Linux
item.description: This is the first article in a series I’m starting about using VS Code on Mac to work with MS SQL Server on Linux running in a Docker container. First, if you don’t have already Docker for Mac installed, go ahead and install it. At the time of writing this article I’m using Docker for Mac Community Edition verison 17.03.1-ce-rc1-mac3 (15924). After installing Docker make sure you don’t sign in using your Docker ID.
